Seminar on Withdrawal of U.S. Forces Held in S. Korea
articles.content:
Seminar on Withdrawal of U.S. Forces Held in S. Korea 
    Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- A seminar on the subject of the "methodology for the withdrawal of the U.S. troops from south Korea" took place on Nov. 21 under the co-sponsorship of the Headquarters of the People's Movement for the Withdrawal of the U.S. Forces and the Council for National Reconciliation and Independent Reunification, according to a press report.
 Speakers said that there is mounting anti-U.S. call of the people for the withdrawal of the U.S. troops and this is clearly proved by the results of the recent opinion polls conducted by various media organizations.    
 The unequal s. Korea-U.S. relations should be fundamentally terminated, they noted, adding that for this the "south Korea-U.S. Mutual Defense Treaty" which stipulates that "the treaty remains valid for an indefinite period" should be revised to check the U.S. moves for its forces' permanent presence" in S. Korea.

Greetings to Albanian Foreign Minister
articles.content:
Greetings to Albanian Foreign Minister
    Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- Paek Nam Sun, foreign minister of the DPRK, sent a message of greetings to Ilir Meta, foreign minister of Albania, on the national day of his country.
 The message expressed the belief that the relations between the two countries would develop in the mutual interests of the two countries.

articles.title: Solidarity Message to Yasser Arafat
articles.content:
Solidarity Message to Yasser Arafat
    Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, today sent a message of solidarity to Palestinian President Yasser Arafat, chairman of the Executive Committee of the Palestine Liberation Organization and chief of the Palestinian National Authority, on the occasion of the "World Day of Solidarity with the Palestinian people."
 The message said that the Palestinian people are waging a vigorous struggle to put an end to Israel's occupation of the Palestinian territory and achieve national independence under the leadership of the PLO headed by Yasser Arafat and sincerely wished him and the Palestinian people success in their efforts to regain their legitimate national right.

articles.title: Greetings to Albanian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Albanian President
    Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, today sent a message of greetings to Albanian President Alfred Moisiu on the occasion of its national day.
 It expressed the belief that the relations between the two countries would favorably develop in the interests of the two peoples and wished him good health, happiness and great success in his responsible work.
